abstract: Suspect, whose name is not released, is arrested in series of shootings along freeways near Phoenix.
lead_paragraph: A suspect has been arrested in a string of shootings along Phoenix-area freeways that have kept drivers on edge for weeks, state officials said.

headline.main: Arizona: Suspect in Custody in String of Highway Shootings
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Suspect in Custody in String of Highway Shootings

snippet: A suspect has been arrested in a string of shootings along Phoenix-area freeways that have kept drivers on edge for weeks, state officials said.
